title: One Small Miracle
description: Anna and Jared West reunite to look after baby Melanie at their Outback home. As if changing diapers, mushing baby food and sleepless nights weren't enough of a challenge, Anna and Jared must confront what went wrong in their marriage.Could this dimpled, smiling bundle of joy be the one small miracle who can rescue all their hopes and dreams?
author: Melissa James
